profile.name: Fabian Benavides
profile.description: I am a Systems Engineer with eight years of experience as a software developer, who has worked on multiple software development projects for different clients. I started working with Visual Basic.NET and then evolved into C# in the backend while I worked with ASP.NET/Core, Entity Framework, and Windows Services, and I also have been working with Javascript, React.js, and Angular in the frontend. I am also willing to learn new technologies and stacks. For the last years, Agile practices like SCRUM and Kanban have been part of my working days, and I also have been working as a full-stack developer leading different teams as a technical leader.

experience.title: Solutions Developer
responsibilities: Building new features and improvements on frontend and backend code for the different Company apps.
Mentoring other developers to improve their knowledge.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Building new functionalities and refactoring web applications developed with .Net Core and Angular.
Testing functionalities before releasing any code.
Reading and writing code to improve applications performance.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Developing new functionalities and refactoring applications developed by NodeJs.
Writing unit tests related to the functionalities before any release.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Analyzing, developing and testing multiple applications using Microsoft technologies.
Integrating hardware and software to create an application.
achievements: Creating a full application as a freelance.
Learning best practices related with tests and TDD.
Applying micro services to the project.
Utilizing tools for inspection of code like Sonarqube.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Evolving web applications, created with Microsoft technologies.
achievements: Increasing knowledge in AngularJS, ReactJs, Webpack, and CSS.
Applying my knowledge in Scrum and sharing it with the team.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Developing REST APIs and web apps with Windows services and web apps using Microsoft technologies.
Bug fixing the core of the business.
achievements: Creating a service to get more information efficiently from the core of the business.
Participating in the architecture design of a new SMS dispatch platform.
Introducing and applying software programming best practices.
Developing a new component to process files to dispatch messages more efficiently.

education.title: Desarrollo basado en conceptos de Ingeniería de Software
